Content:: M. Joseph Michael Perera is a Sri Lankan politician (born 15 September 1941) and a Former Member of the Parliament of Sri Lanka. He is the 17th Speaker of the Parliament of Sri Lanka. *Appointed MPs were abolished in 1972 by the First Republican Constitution  This article about a politician from Western Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
